00338 #if RKH_TRACE == 1
00339 #if RKH_EN_TIMESTAMP == 1
00340     #if RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING == 1
00341         #define mktrevt( e, i, s, t, n, str )           \
00342                                                         \
00343                                 (e).id = i;             \
00344                                 (e).smix = s;           \
00345                                 (e).ts = t;             \
00346                                 (e).num = n;            \
00347                                 if( str != NULL )       \
00348                                 strcpy( (e).sb, str );  \
00349                                 rkh_trevt( &(e) )
00350     #else
00351         #define mktrevt( e, i, s, t, n, str )           \
00352                                                         \
00353                                 (e).id = i;             \
00354                                 (e).smix = s;           \
00355                                 (e).ts = t;             \
00356                                 (e).num = n;            \
00357                                 rkh_trevt( &(e) )
00358     #endif
00359 #else
00360     #if RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING == 1
00361         #define mktrevt( e, i, s, t, n, str )           \
00362                                                         \
00363                                 (e).id = i;             \
00364                                 (e).smix = s;           \
00365                                 (e).num = n;            \
00366                                 if( str != NULL )       \
00367                                 strcpy( (e).sb, str );  \
00368                                 rkh_trevt( &(e) )
00369     #else
00370         #define mktrevt( e, i, s, t, n, str )           \
00371                                                         \
00372                                 (e).id = i;             \
00373                                 (e).smix = s;           \
00374                                 (e).num = n;            \
00375                                 rkh_trevt( &(e) )
00376     #endif
00377 #endif
00378 #else
00379     #define mktrevt( e, i, s, t, n, str )
00380 #endif
